title: Need help :(
body: can some one help me when i open the game aproblem pops out and crashes my game                                      The application was unable to correctly (0xc000007b).Click OK to close the application.                                                         Can some help me to fix the problem???

replies.body: This could be due to 2 different things most likely. Let's first make sure your OS has the right admin settings in place so that League can access the files it needs to run. Run through the steps in this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and let me know if that doesn't help so we can dig a little more.
